message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see a line item called "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the cost of inventory items that were sold during the period. This is exactly what the task is asking for - the carrying amount of inventories sold.

In the income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" is reported as 1,312,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1312000.00'} }
```
